Name: Mon Dernier Mot (My Last Word)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered crystallised ginger.
Review: Tangy lemon and cognac with sweet herbal and ginger notes. An interesting riff on The Last Word .
History: Created in 2015 by Edward Godard at Berlin Bar in Melbourne, Australia. Last Word history
Nutrition: One serving of Mon Dernier Mot (My Last Word) contains 208 calories
